feed.title: Research into the effects of a cluster size limited mempool in 2023

entry.title: Research into the effects of a cluster size limited mempool in 2023
entry.summary: The inquiry centers on the availability and potential publication of logs and a patched version of Bitcoin Core, highlighting their perceived value to the community. The sender expresses interest in knowing whether these resources are accessible publicly, suggesting that their availability could benefit the broader community involved with Bitcoin Core. This reflects an underlying recognition of the importance of sharing developmental tools and enhancements in open-source projects, which can aid in collective problem-solving and the advancement of the software.
